article_title: Bringing broken survivors of the Nova festival attack back from darkness.
sentence: Two  months  ago,  early  on  7  October,  more  than  360  young  partygoers  were  shot,  beaten  or  burnt  to  death  by  Hamas  attackers,  who  stormed  the  Nova  music  festival  site  near  the  Israel-Gaza  perimeter  fence.

article_title: Bringing broken survivors of the Nova festival attack back from darkness.
sentence: Later,  distressing  videos  from  first  responders  began  to  confirm  the  scale  of  the  massacre,  as  they  filmed  scores  of  murdered  partygoers.
